metadata.notes: Comprehensive turf fertilizer database - real products only. PFC products scraped from plantfoodco.com with verified guaranteed analysis data.

pfc_0-0-25_potassium_17s.application_notes: Chloride-free potassium with 17% sulfur, neutral to basic clear liquid

pfc_polyphosphite_30.application_notes: Pure potassium polyphosphite (phosphorous acid form H3PO3) for plant defense and K nutrition

pfc_0-0-29_infiltrate_k.application_notes: Organic-based potassium acetate for enhanced plant uptake, acetate delivery system

pfc_2-20-22_dkp_xtra.application_notes: Potassium polyphosphate and polyphosphite blend for root development and plant defense

pfc_7-0-0_8s.application_notes: Ammonium sulfate liquid, 100% ammonium nitrogen, lowers soil pH, enhances micronutrient availability

pfc_7-0-7_20s_plus.application_notes: Thiosulfate-based N-K with 20% time-release sulfur (1-3 weeks), plus Mn, Mg, and B

pfc_8-16-8_2s.application_notes: Starter/transplant solution with ortho- and polyphosphates, reduces transplant shock

pfc_8-27-5_healthy_start.application_notes: Ammonium polyphosphate and phosphite solution with 24 oz PolyPhosphite 30 per gallon, for root development and Poa stress recovery

pfc_10-2-4_sulfur_micros.application_notes: 5:1:2 ratio, ammonium and nitrate quick release N, EDTA chelated micronutrients, no chlorides, potassium acetate for foliar penetration

pfc_10-2-10_50srn.application_notes: 1:1 N-K ratio, 50% slow release from Triazone, foliar and root application for golf turf

pfc_10-4-6_sulfur_micros.application_notes: 5:2:3 ratio, ammonium and nitrate quick release N, EDTA chelated micronutrients, no chlorides

pfc_10-10-10_sulfur_micros.application_notes: Balanced 1:1:1 ratio with urea nitrogen, full EDTA chelated micronutrient package

pfc_10-34-0.application_notes: High phosphorus for Poa annua stress relief and root development, irrigate immediately after application

pfc_12-0-12_50srn.application_notes: Balanced N-K, 50% slow release Triazone, full EDTA chelated micronutrient package

pfc_12-3-12_50srn.application_notes: Complete NPK with 50% slow release Triazone N, full EDTA chelated micronutrient package

pfc_12-3-12_50srn_synergy.application_notes: 12-3-12 with Vitamin Amino Acid Matrix (VAM), carbohydrates, sulfur, and EDTA chelated micros

pfc_16-0-8_50srn.application_notes: No phosphate, 50% SRN Triazone, full EDTA chelated micronutrient package, foliar and root

pfc_16-2-5_25srn.application_notes: 25% SRN Triazone, chelated micronutrients, amino acids matrix, stress tolerance

pfc_16-2-7_25srn.application_notes: 4 nitrogen sources, 2 potassium sources, chelated micros, Mg, S, Amino Acid Matrix and carbohydrates

pfc_16-2-8_50srn.application_notes: 50% SRN Triazone, full EDTA chelated micronutrient package, tank mix with Adams Earth and PolyPhosphite 30

pfc_18-3-3_green_t.application_notes: All quick release nitrogen for immediate plant response, good turf safety, tank mix with PolyPhosphite 30 and 12 Iron

pfc_18-3-4_super_mk.application_notes: EDTA chelated micronutrients, Vitamin Amino Acid Matrix (VAM) and carbohydrates for stress tolerance

pfc_18-3-6_50srn.application_notes: 50% SRN Triazone, full EDTA chelated micronutrient package with sulfur, foliar and root

pfc_20-0-0_50srn.application_notes: High nitrogen, 50% slow release Triazone, 50% quick release. Special order minimum 500 gallons

pfc_20-3-3_20srn_iron.application_notes: General purpose with 20% SRN and iron, non-chloride K source, year-round application

pfc_26-1-4_75msn.application_notes: 75% Methylene Stabilized Nitrogen (triazone-methylene urea complex), for fairways and roughs, extended release

pfc_28-0-0_72srn.application_notes: 72% slow release Triazone nitrogen, extended feeding for greens and fairways

pfc_29-0-0_50srn.application_notes: Four nitrogen sources with calcium, sulfur and chelated micronutrients, 50% SRN Triazone

pfc_30-0-0_uan.application_notes: Quick release UAN (nitrate, ammoniacal, urea N), rapid response, effective at low temps, may burn at high rates

pfc_30-0-0_60srn.application_notes: 60% SRN methylene urea and triazone polymers, releases over 60-90 days, deep root feeding capable

pfc_30-0-0_90msn.application_notes: 90% Methylene Stabilized Nitrogen, triazone-methylene urea complex, extended season nitrogen release

pfc_adams_earth.application_notes: Organic blend of humic/amino acids, Ascophyllum Nodosum seaweed extract, natural sugars, vitamins; improves rooting and microbial activity

pfc_blackstrap_molasses.application_notes: Sugar energy source for soil microorganisms, contains sugars, carbon, enzymes, B-vitamins and trace elements

pfc_impulse_green_t.application_notes: Amino acid and sucrose from stress-resistant plant complexes, salicylic acid for systemic acquired resistance

pfc_kelplant_1-0-1.application_notes: Ascophyllum Nodosum seaweed extract plus humic and fulvic acids

pfc_omega_x34.application_notes: Non-burning blend of yucca plant extracts and chitosan, activates plant defense, requires pH 3.5-5.5 spray solution

pfc_humic_acid_19.application_notes: Concentrated liquid humic acids with micronutrients, enhances nutrient uptake and soil conditioning

pfc_sugar_cal_10_calcium.application_notes: Sorbitol-chelated calcium for cell wall strength and nutrient availability

pfc_cal_nitrate_9-0-0.application_notes: Liquid calcium nitrate for cell wall formation, root and leaf stimulation, neutralizes organic acids

pfc_calcium_thiosulfate.application_notes: Neutral to basic clear liquid, 6% Ca and 10% S thiosulfate, do not apply above 90F

pfc_magnesium_4.application_notes: Magnesium glucoheptonate chelate, prevents Mg binding with phosphate, sustained green color

pfc_magnesium_nitrate_7-0-0.application_notes: Nitrate nitrogen with 6% magnesium from magnesium oxide and nitric acid, promotes chlorophyll and root development

pfc_ammthiosulfate_12-0-0.application_notes: Clear liquid N and S source, pH 7-8, do not apply on germinating seeds or combine with acidic materials below pH 6

pfc_30_cal_12_calcium.application_notes: Calcium carbonate and calcium acetate liquid, displaces sodium in soil, supports cell wall development

pfc_foremula_liquagyp.application_notes: Clear calcium thiosulfate liquid with nitrogen, displaces sodium, improves soil structure and water infiltration

pfc_foremula_liqualime.application_notes: Liquid carbonate with three calcium sources and thiosulfate sulfur, displaces sodium and chloride, generates CO2 for photosynthesis

pfc_6_iron_12-0-0.application_notes: Iron-N complex with ALPHA MAT mineral acid technology, 6% Fe, 0.05% Mn, 3.3% S, performs 21-28 days. Corrosive to mild steel/aluminum/brass

pfc_12_iron_12-0-0.application_notes: Glucoheptonate chelated 6% Fe, 2% Mn (3:1 ratio), 4% S, 0.25% Mg; deep green within 12 hours, no excess growth

pfc_boron_10.application_notes: 10% boron liquid for deficiency correction, essential for new tissue development and fruit set, do not exceed 1 gal/acre

pfc_copper_5_gluco.application_notes: 5% copper glucoheptonate chelate, supports photosynthesis, respiration, and chlorophyll synthesis

pfc_iron_5_gluco.application_notes: 5% iron glucoheptonate chelate, excellent tissue penetration within 12-48 hours, promotes chlorophyll

pfc_kelp_iron.application_notes: Iron with manganese and fulvic acid, 3:1 Fe-Mn ratio, acid-based technology dissolves bicarbonates. Corrosive to mild steel/aluminum/brass

pfc_manganese_5_gluco.application_notes: 5% manganese glucoheptonate chelate, enters plant tissue within 12-48 hours, synergistic with iron

pfc_micro_mix.application_notes: Complete glucoheptonate chelated micronutrient blend with Mg and S, encapsulated micros prevent soil binding

pfc_sili_k_21_silica.application_notes: Silica and potassium complex (2-0-10), stiffens leaf blades, improves ball roll, drought resistance and chlorophyll synthesis

pfc_zinc_7_gluco.application_notes: 7% zinc glucoheptonate chelate, prevents zinc binding with phosphate, extends nutrient availability

pfc_phusion_manganese_7.application_notes: Acid-based manganese with urea-sulfuric acid, corrects Mn deficiencies in soil

pfc_micro_pack_edta.product_name: Green-T Micro Pack EDTA Chelate Solution
pfc_micro_pack_edta.application_notes: EDTA chelated micronutrient solution, longest-lasting chelation, plant-accessible in 3 days, available for 4 weeks

pfc_hydration_a_plus.application_notes: Solubilizing surfactant with ALPHA MAT mineral acid technology, zero burn, performs 21-28 days, reduces sodium and bicarbonates

pfc_flo_thru_a_plus.application_notes: Acid-based penetrant and bicarbonate reducer, dissolves bicarbonates to release calcium and displace sodium

pfc_regulate_plus.application_notes: Dual action penetrant and super water holding agent, prevents and cures localized dry spots (LDS)

pfc_flo_thru_plus_penetrant.application_notes: Concentrated soil penetrant with salicylic acid, breaks water tension, uniform distribution, reduces runoff

pfc_hydration.application_notes: 100% nonionic surfactant blend, prevents and cures localized dry spots, reduces irrigation water use

pfc_a_plus_pellet.application_notes: Wetting agent pellet (8 oz each) with surfactants, mineral acid and salicylic acid, spot treatment for hydrophobic areas, hose-end application

pfc_hydration_ac_fertigation.application_notes: Commercial tech-grade concentrated injection solution, pure virgin ingredients safe for injection systems, wall-to-wall moisture control

pfc_greenblade.application_notes: Most natural-looking turfgrass pigment and spray pattern indicator, maintain pH 3.5+ in tank, allow 30 min dry time

pfc_phirst_urea_sulfuric.application_notes: 15% urea + 49% virgin sulfuric acid, SG 1.52, treats irrigation water with bicarbonates >120ppm and/or SAR >6.0, includes corrosion inhibitor

pfc_phusion_organic_acid.application_notes: Modified organic acid from lignin with 30% carbon, acidifies water, destroys bicarbonates, frees soil-bonded Ca and Mg

pfc_alpha_mat.application_notes: Mineral acid technology with salicylic acid and penetrating surfactant, dissolves soil bicarbonates, spray tank buffer to pH 5.5

pfc_kphite_7lp.application_notes: Systemic fungicide/bactericide for Pythium, Phytophthora, Downy Mildew control on turf, ornamentals and trees

pfc_humic_acid_70.application_notes: Granulated humate (125 SGN, 40 lb bags), increases root growth, chlorophyll, nutrient uptake, soil quality and water retention

pfc_gypsum_phusion.application_notes: Pelletized gypsum reacted with organic acid (calcium lignosulfonate), faster than standard gypsum, does not raise pH, max 15 lbs/1000 sq ft

pfc_lime_phusion.application_notes: Pelletized limestone reacted with organic acid, 4x faster than conventional lime, 500 lbs equals 1 ton conventional

pfc_kcs_plus_0-0-18.application_notes: Five vital nutrients: K, Ca, Mg, S, Mn with pHusion organic acid to release tied-up nutrients

pfc_kms_plus_0-0-12.application_notes: Potassium, calcium, magnesium, sulfur with pHusion organic acid, max 5 lbs/1000 sq ft on established turf, irrigate after

pfc_kms_0-0-28.application_notes: High K with 14% Mg and 12% S, pHusion organic acid, max 4 lbs/1000 sq ft, repeat every 3-4 weeks

pfc_kcs_0-0-25.application_notes: Potassium, calcium, sulfur with pHusion organic acid, repeat every 3-4 weeks, irrigate after application

pfc_sea_e_c_connection_minerals.application_notes: Zeolite and leonardite blend to increase CEC, mix with top dressing sand and divot mix, improves nutrient retention

pfc_gypsum_0-0-4_connection.application_notes: Gypsum with zeolite, humic acid and manganese, mineral-based K carriers prevent soil tie-up, for stress tolerance

pfc_10-10-10_connection.application_notes: Balanced granular NPK with sulfur, zinc, zeolite and humic acid; stabilizes N and improves nutrient retention in sandy/low-CEC soils

foliarpak_foundation_forty.application_notes: Amino acid based complete foliar nutrition

foliarpak_csi_l.application_notes: Silicon plus potassium for plant strength

foliarpak_armament.application_notes: Carrier and chelator technology for enhanced uptake

foliarpak_colonise_bio.application_notes: Biological inoculant for soil and foliar use

foliarpak_1-0-15-growin.application_notes: K-heavy formula for grow-in and establishment

foliarpak_30-0-0-carbosential.application_notes: High-N liquid with iron and carbon

foliarpak_phusion.application_notes: Calcium plus phosphite for plant health

foliarpak_promote.application_notes: Iron plus potassium for color and stress tolerance

foliarpak_mkp.application_notes: Monopotassium phosphate for root development and stress recovery

target_24-0-8-fertigreen.application_notes: Professional grade granular with slow-release N

jdl_12-0-0-liquid-fe.application_notes: Liquid iron and nitrogen for greens

floratine_astron.application_notes: Calcium plus silica for cell wall strength

floratine_pk_fight.application_notes: High P-K for stress recovery and root development

floratine_turgor.application_notes: Potassium and calcium for cell turgidity

floratine_cpr.application_notes: Carbon-based biostimulant for soil health and microbial activity

floratine_perk_up.application_notes: Stress recovery formula with balanced N-K and amino acids

floratine_knife.application_notes: Soil surfactant and wetting agent for improved water penetration

floratine_cuzin.application_notes: Copper and zinc micronutrient source for turf health

floratine_natural_wet.application_notes: Natural-based wetting agent for hydrophobic soil management

floratine_maxiplex.application_notes: Amino acid chelated micronutrients with Fe, Mn, and Zn

floratine_nutripak.application_notes: Complete nutrition package for foliar feeding programs

floratine_power_play.application_notes: Potassium source for stress tolerance and cell function

floratine_root_zone.application_notes: Root growth stimulant for enhanced rooting depth and density

floratine_pervade.application_notes: Penetrant and carrier for improved product uptake and movement

floratine_transition.application_notes: Heat stress recovery and seasonal transition support

floratine_k_phite.application_notes: Potassium phosphite for plant defense and K nutrition

floratine_foltron.application_notes: Iron and manganese micronutrient foliar for color and health

floratine_armor.application_notes: Silicon-based product for plant stress resistance and cell wall fortification

floratine_fast_break.application_notes: Surfactant for improved spray coverage and soil water movement

floratine_replenish_12-4-6.application_notes: Complete liquid fertilizer for foliar and soil applications

floratine_triple_play.application_notes: Balanced micronutrient package with equal N-P-K

andersons_contec_dg.application_notes: Activated carbon + humic DG for greens

andersons_18-0-4-acelepryn.application_notes: Fertilizer + insecticide combo for preventive grub control

andersons_22-0-4.application_notes: XCU slow release for extended feeding

lebanon_8-2-10-mesa.application_notes: MESA greens grade with high iron

lebanon_country_club_18-4-10.application_notes: Mini-prill complete for tees and approaches

koch_uflexx_46-0-0.application_notes: Stabilized urea with urease + nitrification inhibitor

generic_urea_46-0-0.application_notes: Quick-release nitrogen, apply in cool weather

generic_mop_0-0-60.application_notes: Potassium chloride, avoid on salt-sensitive turf

generic_ferrous_sulfate.application_notes: Iron source, acidifying, can stain concrete

generic_milorganite.application_notes: Organic biosolid, slow release, low burn risk

generic_iron_eddha.application_notes: Chelated iron for high-pH soils, most stable chelate

generic_potassium_silicate.application_notes: Silicon source for disease suppression and stress tolerance

generic_gypsum_calcium_sulfate.application_notes: Calcium and sulfur source, improves sodium soils

generic_lime_calcium_carbonate.application_notes: pH adjustment, apply based on soil test

generic_dolomitic_lime.application_notes: pH adjustment with magnesium, for low-Mg soils

generic_sulfur_elemental.application_notes: Soil acidifier, apply max 5 lbs/1000, requires microbial conversion
